bug.author: dee0512
bug.summary: Convolution connections do not have normalize_by_max function
bug.description: Convolution connections are broken due to the normalize_by_max function in the network init file.

comments.comment: How are we going to fix this? Do we need / ? Can these be implemented in individual experiments scripts rather than at the repo level? <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Hananel-Hazan>@Hananel-Hazan</denchmark-link>
